Living Technology Lexicon

Empirical mapping of technology terminology across research, legal, industry, and public domains. Updated continuously as concepts evolve.

Featured Concepts

Agentic AI

Systems capable of goal-directed behavior with autonomous decision-making. 7 competing definitions identified across domains.

Emerging High Velocity Updated 3 days ago

Algorithmic Decision System

Legal term with critical technical misalignment. Current California definition technically includes Excel spreadsheets.

Legal Gap Updated 1 week ago

Chain-of-Thought

Prompting technique that elicits step-by-step reasoning. Strong correlation with "reasoning" (0.89) and unexpected cluster with "error correction" (0.76).

Established Updated 2 weeks ago

Observable Function

Framework for describing AI capabilities through observable behavioral patterns rather than anthropomorphic attribution or categorical denial.

Emerging Updated 1 day ago

Constitutional AI

Alignment method using explicit principles to guide model behavior. Anthropic-originated term with growing cross-industry adoption.

Established Updated 1 month ago
